attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to use Overhead Motorway Signs to advise motorists to move over to the left lane as soon as it is safe to do so.   This encouragement should reduce congestion, ease traffic flow and might even reduce the need to widen existing motorways.   I think we have all been frustrated by being 'held up' by a vehicle travelling at say 60 mph in the outside lane, while the inner lane(s) remain empty !  .... 

MOVE TO LEFT HAND LANE  
AS SOON AS SAFE TO DO SO

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
